EmailTemplate.name: Auto-Response for Copado Support Cases
EmailTemplate.subject: [Copado] Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}: "{!Case.Subject}" has been created.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Copado Support Thanks for contacting Copado support. Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}: "{!Case.Subject}" has been created. Issue definition: {!Case.Description_Rich__c} Communication: Initial response time for new cases for Standard support customers is 2 business days. Initial response time for Premier Success customers is 8 hours. Copado Solutions will never ask for your account password. For your own privacy and security NEVER send your credentials by email. You can visit our documentation site, where you will find useful information about Copado.
Thank you. Copado Support Team
Case tracking Id: {!Case.Thread_Id} Copado Solutions S.L.
